item.title: U
item.description: score:210 Chances: Unity Software Inc. (U) has been upgraded to a Zacks Rank #2 (Buy), reflecting growing optimism about the company’s earnings prospects. The metaverse market is predicted to surge to $507 billion by 2030, exhibiting a tenfold growth from its current standing, according to Statista.

item.title: SHOP
item.description: score:-5 Chances: The internet has continued to propel the exchange of goods and services with Shopify (SHOP) being one of the fastest-growing commerce platforms. In an environment of low market interest rates, growth stocks, especially in the technology sector, such as Shopify, tend to thrive.

item.title: ON
item.description: score:50 Chances: ON Semiconductor Corp. (ON) has received quite a bit of attention from Zacks.com users lately. Therefore, it is wise to be aware of the facts that can impact the stock’s prospects. As the festive season rolls in, finding the best tech stocks to buy is exciting, lighting up various sectors with innovative energy.
